meanings.definition: To let saliva flow from the mouth; to slobber
meanings.sent1: The dog drools when it sees food.
meanings.sent2: She drools when she sleeps sometimes.
meanings.sent3: The baby drools all over his bib.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet drools water constantly.
meanings.sent5: The thought of pizza makes him drool with hunger.

meanings.definition: To show excessive admiration or desire
meanings.sent1: She drools over the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: He drools over expensive sports cars.
meanings.sent3: The teenager drools over the celebrity's new album.
meanings.sent4: The fan drools over meeting their favorite actor.
meanings.sent5: The child drools over the toy store display.
